name: Gamedrome
description:
Aelin, the protagonist, ist trapped in a mysterious game, where the Game Master says he can help, but is he really helping? Try to escape for your own!

Moving with WASD and SPACE for jumping and dialog (or mouseclick)

This game is made in Unity for the Community Gamejam 2019 with two people.

Game Desing: heiz13, juribabarov

Programming, Leveldesign, Audio: juribabarov

Graphics: heiz13
